title: Dead Band Calculation Function
description: This function calculates the dead band value based on the input value X and a specified limit L. If X exceeds L, the function returns the difference between X and L. If X is lower than -L, it returns the sum of X and L. If X is within the range of -L to L, it returns 0.0.
name: DEAD_BAND

input.name: X
input.description: The input value for which the dead band is calculated.

input.name: L
input.description: The limit value used to determine the dead band thresholds.

return_value.description: The calculated dead band value based on the input conditions.
